website_summaries.verdict: These aquatic dumbbells give you a great workout at home, and dry quickly for transportation when you use them away from home.
pros: Dry quickly and are incredibly light but as soon as they hit the water they become a great workout
Caps are durable and won't fall off
You can get them in blue, green, or yellow
cons: Might be too intense for someone just starting water aerobics

website_summaries.verdict: These water barbells make it easy to transform a good water aerobics workout into a great one.
pros: EVA foam guarantees the barbells have low water absorption
Wonderful for users of all ages who want to strengthen the upper body, lower back, and abs
Lightweight outside of a pool and heavy under water
cons: Tend to scratch and dent and suffer discoloration easily
Not as heavy as comparable barbells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: You can't imagine how thrilled I am that the ends don't pop off and that I don't have to go swimming and diving all over the pool to retrieve them, even after the hardiest of workouts everything stays intact and I get an amazing workout. Fabulous product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my senior dog!
customer_reviews.text: So I’m using one of these for my senior dog to hold while she’s doing her therapy swim. It helps keep her nose above the water. The owner of the therapy pool even bought one from me to use with other dogs that go there!
customer_reviews.author: ruby

customer_reviews.title: Must have for Aqua  Aerobics
customer_reviews.text: I take an Aqua Class 2 days a week. They are always running out of weights. I got these and LOVE them. These are better since they have spaces. Still get a great workout without the arm pain. They flow right through the water. Once I brought them in 2 other women bought a set. ♥️
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette R Graves

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I have been using them 4-5 days ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these . I have been using them 4-5 days a week for the last 6 weeks . Toning has started . Lost weigh and feeling great. These are well built and does the job. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah  Jane

customer_reviews.title: Enhanced My Water Aerobics Immensely
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to get as much resistance in the water as I did with these! They really give my arms a workout, and I also use them for balancing when I'm doing leg work. They gouge very easily but otherwise have held up very well with over a month's use, up to 3x's a week in the water. My mother liked mine so much she bought her own pair. They've definitely enhanced my water aerobics in every way and I will be buying another set if these break or no longer up to par.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Riley (Tiger's Eye Tarot)

customer_reviews.title: I've been using pool weights for almost a year and these are great. The quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I have the blue set. They are quite "heavy" and offer quite a bit of resistance. I've been using pool weights for almost a year and these are great. The quality is good, the price is right, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K

customer_reviews.title: Love these, Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money, had to buy 2 pair for my friends and family when they come over! The kids also use them to stay a float In the pool. Super light weight and fun to use! The first time I used them, I looked up a YOUTUBE video of water aerobics and decided to give it a try for about 30 mins or so... Once we got out of the pool my sister and I felt like we had just had a FULL 1 hour workout. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: the foam is very easily punctured or scratched by simply putting them down by ...
customer_reviews.text: While these are exactly what I wanted, the foam is very easily punctured or scratched by simply putting them down by the pool. I went to grab one and my nail scratched the side casing a large chunk to come out of the side. I would have though that these would have been a little more durable and not so easily damaged. However, I like the color and they work well in the water so I will not be returning. Just be advised if you put them in with your keys or anything else they will get damaged easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie P

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the third use
customer_reviews.text: These felt good and worked well for the two times I used them. On the third time, the end popped right off. It won’t stay on the handle any longer. I now have to return them for a refund or find some sort of adhesive to glue the end back on to fix the defective product. I recommend saving yourself some time and money by purchasing an alternative that will last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D.

customer_reviews.title: Great but fell apart on 2nd Use!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited for these weights because they were economical and well reviewed. They worked exactly as I hoped on the first use. I stored them outside of the pool and went out to use them two days later, and the end came off one of the weights. I thought that it was no big deal and I could just put the weighted end back on, but the end comes off now every time I try to use them. I am giving two stars because if the product had not fallen apart, they would have been just what I wanted for a good water workout. I certainly expected to get more than one use out of them! So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: P. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Nice economical set of pool dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: This is a foam set of dumbbells for the pool. The user can use it while jogging in the pool or doing aqua aerobics. Outside of the pool, they’re a half pound. However, in the pool, the resistance is much more. The harder and faster you push and pull, the heavier it gets. It is like having a 10-13 lb dumbbell. Once you’re done, it’s important to let it air dry. Because it’s foam it can deform and break down over time. It’s good enough for a summer. Hard plastic or other polymer would give you more long term stability and ability. However, this ought to help you achieve your goals for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Eagle VisionTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what i needed to make my water aerobics more challenging . There are so many more moves i can do now that i have them. They are extremely light weight when dry. (so much so that we thought the box was empty when it was delivered. lol) but they become heavier in the water. the foam fights to rise to the surface of the water while you have to keep them under. Excellent. Definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well these work in the pool! I’m not sure what I was expecting but I was very pleasantly surprised at how these pool dumbbells increased my fitness lever in the pool, so quickly. They’re my #1 go to on any pool exercise. They help stabilize my core while doing other pool exercises. Ya just gotta try them to understand! Wonderful for any fitness level!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Low to medium resistance at best!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for aqua aerobics at the YMCA. I usually use the dumbells with the highest resistance. I ordered these after reading the reviews and thought they would work. The resistance is about low to medium at best. After using them, one seemed to had water stuck in the hand grip and the end was already coming apart. I'm glad the return process was very easy. Just take them to the UPS Store and they will box them and send them.
customer_reviews.author: A Hudson

customer_reviews.title: I love these Dumbbells.
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly perfect. They are lightweight out of the pool, and nice and heavy under water. I love these weights. Couldn't imagine anything better for my pool exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Wissahickon

customer_reviews.title: Nice exercise weights for pool!
customer_reviews.text: These are great weights to help you exercise in the water! We use these in our pool while swimming around and it does give your arms a nice workout! It’s nice to be able to do your own water aerobics in your backyard. We’ve had them for a year now and they are pretty durable, sometimes the side weight things do fall off but can easily go back on. Recommend these if you want to work out in the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Customers

customer_reviews.title: Great resistance. I intend to buy 2 mor r ...
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! They provide floatation while exercising in deep water. Great resistance. I intend to buy 2 mor r pairs as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Burger Trillhaase

customer_reviews.title: Best water dumbells ever!
customer_reviews.text: These water dumbells are great! I didn't think they would be this awesome. You can really feel the pull underwater and gives you a great workout. They help you float, swim and exercise! A trifecta! Heck, I even used them, one on each side of my water lounger, as a way to keep my arms out and get some color on the underside of my arms. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ries

customer_reviews.title: Foam Easily Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I liked that these came in various colors so they would be easy to identify within my aquacize group. But they are so easily damaged... just in the transport from my apartment to the pool downstairs 3 times and this is what they look like already. They've not been abused at all, just put together in a bag and carried downstairs. Sadly I'm returning them and looking for something a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Poppins

customer_reviews.title: No Excuse for This!
customer_reviews.text: The box wasn't damaged, so why was this obviously damaged item placed in the box and sent to me? The hole goes straight through the foam. Who has time to pack this back up and send it back? Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: BelleVieBeth

customer_reviews.title: Great floats for adult
customer_reviews.text: Great floats for adult. I use these to swim laps without having to submerge my head. I place each armpit on the black bar in the middle and swim like a fish! I previously used the equipment provided by the pool, but prefer to have my own set to avoid public germs. These are fantastic! The are sturdy and look exactly like the picture. I get a great workout.
customer_reviews.author: T and P Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Work beautifully
customer_reviews.text: These weights have held up beautifully so far. Ordered them for a water aerobics class (8 sessions). While many of the other class participants weights were falling apart, coming off the handle, etc. Mine held up just fine. Am very happy with my purchase. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is I wish they had come with a mesh bag to store them. Plus, I rarely give something the highest rating...these were close though.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Hazelbaker

customer_reviews.title: Glue not holding
customer_reviews.text: What the hell used it a handful of times and just found out by wife that’s it fell apart. I would of been okay for it to last 1 season but come on the season just started.
customer_reviews.author: Armond Andranian

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are about a medium weight - very comfortable to hold. Overall extremely happy with the purchase. UPDATE - used these in the water for the first time today - They aren't "heavy" but they do seem to be heavier than the pink of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: LissyVA

customer_reviews.title: I love the color of these plus no one else has ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had several sets of aquatic bells stolen despite my name being on them. However, they were the usual blue and white that so many people use and were probably mistaken for someone else's. I love the color of these plus no one else has them, so if they're pink they're mine!
customer_reviews.author: E. Cornell

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality foam material
customer_reviews.text: Dumbbells are poor quality material. I have used them for about a month now and the foam has small holes on the edges. I will not purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Increases the water resistance well
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells work well in the water, really making you work. i love the sea foam green color--different from the other ones in class. My only concern is that they seems to "chip" easily if something snags them and also gauge easily--not as pretty but still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Zingara

customer_reviews.title: it is fraying around the edges
customer_reviews.text: it is great to work out with. I was a little concerned at first because it is so light weight. But the edges are already starting to pit.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn T.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a water aerobics class. I got them in purple because that's my favorite color. They are sturdy and do the job they were intended to do.
customer_reviews.author: Niskymom

customer_reviews.title: Grest
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife. She had back surgery. We have a pool so she works out in the pool during the summer instead of going to physical therapy. She loves them and they’re the same type of weights used at her physical therapy sessions
customer_reviews.author: John C. Kroeger

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than I expected. Also, ends of ...
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I expected. Also, ends of bells slip off when I am using them in the pool and have to be put back on. Thinking I am going to have to put some glue inside the hole to keep them on.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I used at the pool when I was in Florida last January and periodically in pools when I get the opportunity. I saw results particularly in shoulders and arms by using consistently. A great product! Highly recommend for water aerobics!
customer_reviews.author: Sheilas

customer_reviews.title: Inspired others in pool to order them
customer_reviews.text: Great, lightweight for carrying to the pool and a real game changer when you are in the water. Good for water aerobics, water weight resistance training or just floating around. Several friends have ordered after trying them.
customer_reviews.author: Wysenot

customer_reviews.title: Heavy water resistance
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a water aerobics class. The foam on one dumbell was creased when they were delivered, but this did not impact their usability. They are heavier than other dumbells, give quite a bit of water resistance. I suppose with time, I will get used to the heavier weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Very effective for a complete upper body workout
customer_reviews.text: In the short time I have been using these in my water aerobic classes, my muscles in arms, chest, shoulders and back are stronger and more shapely. These "barbells" are easy to get used to using. . They are surprisingly light weight when not in the water but very effective when in the pool. I am 66 year old female and am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too light weight
customer_reviews.text: I wish these had some sort of resistance rating because they feel almost like nothing when you are pushing them in the water. They do float though and you can use them as weights, but it feels like your're using a half pound weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Dumb Bells
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for using in a pool. I like the arm muscle tone I have received from using these bells in the pool. I highly recommend this product. I use them in a swim spa mostly while using the built in treadmill. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: luvcritters

customer_reviews.title: It really gives you a good workout
customer_reviews.text: I looked up youtube videos on how to use these and they are just amazing. I didn't think they would work as well as they do, but man did my arms hurt the day after (in a good way). I would certainly recommend these to anyone looking for a good workout in the swimming pool.
customer_reviews.author: am Seal

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Using these in the pool daily to build strength. Great for if you just can't be bothered to go to a class (or the time isn't right for you) so you can copy the instructor's exercises in your own pool - or YouTube some exercises for the water. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: supertennis

customer_reviews.title: gap in dumbbells
customer_reviews.text: i have only had these for a month and there is a gap between the dumbbell and the cap on the end. while exercising in water the dumbbell moves..would like to return and receive a new set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I like the water dumbbells but the color is not accurate. The blue came OK but the orange, well... not actually orange but yellow (a little bit disappointed for me). Haven't use it yet but they seem ok.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Michineau

customer_reviews.title: They work well for exercising in the water
customer_reviews.text: I tried to contact the seller but did not have any luck. They are great for working out with I was just a little concerned that it looks like one of them was chewed up by a mouse. And the other one has a gouge in it. They work well for exercising in the water
customer_reviews.author: sherilyn

customer_reviews.title: They do what they are suppose to do.
customer_reviews.text: I attend a water aerobics class a couple times a week and there are certain movements the weights work very well with. The hardest thing about these......they do not stack and you can't carry two in one hand.
customer_reviews.author: P. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pool buddy
customer_reviews.text: Use these daily in my backyard pool. Best feature was the price - will be ordering another set for my husband. Perfect for water exercise!!
customer_reviews.author: cmr

customer_reviews.title: Box and product destroyed.  Buy USA!
customer_reviews.text: The box and weights arrived completely destroyed and the weights are not usable. I requested a refund; we’ll see what happens. This is the second item received from China that is totally unusable. I received a refund for the other product and expect to receive a refund for this one as well. Will no longer purchase items outside of the US. I have learned my lesson!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: I use these dumbbells for my water aerobic classes and they really make a difference in the work out for my arms. The grip is comfortable, and the dumbbells are easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: everyone loves these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair for my mom. She took them to the pool with her and everyone was jealous so she just bought 2 more pairs for her friends!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Chandal

customer_reviews.title: GETS THE JOB DONE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for some rehab this summer. They are doing the job, but the foam is not holding up very well despite keeping them rinsed from chlorine and out of the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Chasing MY Life

customer_reviews.title: VERY WATER RESISTANT -- YOU MUST BE STRONG TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: Too water resistant for this gal. Much more water resistance than the community pool dumbbells which are fine for me. You need to be super strong to start with these.
customer_reviews.author: Maui Glo

customer_reviews.title: Great for water exercise
customer_reviews.text: Have used these many times so for and I believe they have helped in doing the exercises. Hold up very well during the intense exercises. Use these in a senior aquatic class.
customer_reviews.author: W. Tarin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Water resistantancy is where you get the workout. I now use these everytime I am in the pool. Starting to show strength improvement in upper arms
customer_reviews.author: Donna Berry

customer_reviews.title: CRUMPLED
customer_reviews.text: This is our third set of water weights I have purchased. Never had one arrive "dented", but it was. It certainly doesn't harm the performance, but kind of weird.
customer_reviews.author: snash52

customer_reviews.title: work it, grrrl!
customer_reviews.text: got these for my senior citizen mommy to work out with in the pool! it's just perfect for her- she doesn't have to go to the gym or try to handle heavy weights! awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I used these all summer for my pool exercise, they really do the trick, good resistance, lightweight, buoyant. I can't wait to get back into the pool!
customer_reviews.author: Stella Z

customer_reviews.title: Great water workout tool
customer_reviews.text: Every day work outs mean a stronger, tanner senior woman. These barbells are just perfect for what I needed. Five neighbors have sets, fortunately all in different colors. jakswims
customer_reviews.author: JAKtravels

customer_reviews.title: Have held up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these quite a while ago and use them a lot. They have held up well. They are the right level of resistance for me to get a good arm work out.
customer_reviews.author: KYKAT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are great for working out in the pool. Not only help in the deep end, but allow for all kinds of exercising. Very very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karinsue

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product since it was pink. After using 2xs , it was to bulky to manage. I couldn’t get my form right. I live in FL . Swimming is the best exercise. This might be good for beginners. Return
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to water exercises
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and hold in water. They provide some resistance but you would get muscles like a body builder. Great for all ages. Very pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: J. Antosz

customer_reviews.title: does the trick
customer_reviews.text: The dumbbells provide great resistance in the water but did start to fade pretty quickly when left in the sun; otherwise, they get the job done
customer_reviews.author: Andrew B

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Within two weeks of using these a handful of times, they completely fell apart. Pieces of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya G

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Easily
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got a defective pair, but one of the black ends cracked after being used four times. I would really like to get one dumbbell replaced. Now, I have to return both. Finding a box big enough to pack both items is going to be a challenge. Ughhh
customer_reviews.author: Go Pens

customer_reviews.title: Didsappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the weights had a big rip in it right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great for pool workouts!
customer_reviews.text: These were a replacement for my original set which was inadvertently thrown away. They look and feel exactly the same. I live in Florida so l workout with them 3-4 times a week 4-5 months out of the year. They are sturdy and comfortable to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: cjb

customer_reviews.title: I use them every day I am in the pool!
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun way to get extra resistance in the water for upper body exercises. Also, useful to hold and float while kicking back legs, even though that’s not an intended use... It works.
customer_reviews.author: AbbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: When they finally arrived, I am satisfied with these Aquatic Exercise Dumbbells - Set of 2 - for my ocean water aerobics class, which is thrice weekly. I am mostly complimented on the color of them (Purple).
customer_reviews.author: Pameli

customer_reviews.title: Medium weight Dumbells
customer_reviews.text: These dumbbells are a medium weight, but not well made. I have only used them 4 times and they are already breaking down. The grip in the middle is also an inch or two short. This makes them hard to grip and you can't hold both in one hand. I would look for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Goetz

customer_reviews.title: Great for water aerobics
customer_reviews.text: Similar to the water weights I use in aqua aerobic class. Definitely gives me a good arm workout when I keep weights immersed in water.
customer_reviews.author: dmc77

customer_reviews.title: Everyone likes the "weight."
customer_reviews.text: People in my Aqua Aerobics class always mention these when they see them. I let them try them and then they end up buying a pair, too. Nice to have my own for when I stay and work-out more, as the club locks their up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Chance

customer_reviews.title: Fun Resistance!
customer_reviews.text: Great for water aerobics. Ordered some for my friends & I b/c there are never enough to go around in our class at the local pool.
customer_reviews.author: SILVER$

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The price was very good. They turned out to be a bit larger than expected. These were replacements for a water aerobics class.
customer_reviews.author: Breckjo

customer_reviews.title: good buoyancy
customer_reviews.text: these made me step up my workout game! they provide a lot of resistance (which also makes them super buoyant when I want to just hang on and float). great color. I hope they hold up well with repeated use.
customer_reviews.author: Wanamama

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Love these dumbbells. Couldn't figure how they were so light yet would be useful for working out. Well, once I tried them out in the water, I soon realized they have quite a bit of resistance to them. I like that the handles have foam also for comfort. I use them daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for pool exercise
customer_reviews.text: seem very light weight for the money but I use them often, wish they had a bit more heft, they blow around in the pool if I don’t put them away.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Saltman

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I always get compliments on these dumbbells! They do a great job in my aerobics routine and never absorb water so they are always dry. Super light when not using but in the water excellent resistance.
customer_reviews.author: DAF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for arm workouts in the pool perfect for all kind of workouts in the fall
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about them. I could hardly push them under the water on the first day but now it’s easier they are just perfect for our workouts and total body workouts in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Short term usage :(
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they are perfect for water fitness but after using them for only 2 weeks, they started peeling off :(
customer_reviews.author: Ballers2Mom

customer_reviews.title: Work very well for stability in the water
customer_reviews.text: As I age, I am losing stability and am especially cautious in the water. When I am holding onto these dumbells there is no fear of falling. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: amreink

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, just turned out to be too heavy for me right now. Fun to use , because color is so cheery. Arthritis is acting up in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pool when on vacation and I’m missing my water aerobics classes,
customer_reviews.text: These are great and seem to be the same good quality we use at the gym for our water aerobics classes.
customer_reviews.author: ruth boling

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I bought pink so that I have my own in class - this way I can use them when class is not in session as well since water fitness is the only thing that I can do easily with my injury. These are great color and fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Withstands chlorine and exercise resistance
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the amount of resistance these pink dumbbells would provide, but I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: TireTracksUpNorth

customer_reviews.title: I feel stronger already!
customer_reviews.text: Love the buoyancy and resistance. Perfect for a more challenging workout, but not too hard. Great for anyone in a home or gym pool. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic is a little cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is garbage, a piece already cracked off on day one. They work fine though and seem to be holding up so far.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: They work great. My wife uses them every time she goes to the gym. Would buy them again from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: lronman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used to take water aerobics and we used some similar to these so I purchased some for our pool and they're great!
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER ALEXANDER

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Mother’s Day for my MIL. She loves them and even uses them to just float around the pool with the kids. I’ve tried them for fun and man, you will get a full arm and core workout using these!
customer_reviews.author: Marvel

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I am taking an aquatics class but don’t know how to swim. I feel confident in the water using these weights. Just the right amount of buoyancy while allowing much needed resistance. Pretty color too!
customer_reviews.author: Bonzy

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my water exercises and they do exactly what they say. They increase the resistance in the water as you do your exercises. I love these and highly recommend them for water exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color and fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and color price is great very easy to change into a different color if you like
customer_reviews.author: Busybee9000

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but more for a man or a younger & stronger woman
customer_reviews.text: There was nothing wrong with the quality of these but they are too hard for me to use. Too much resistance! Every time I do force myself to use them, I end up with either aching shoulders or hands.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used these dumbbells daily for exercise in my swimming pool. As a result my back has strengthened. This is a wonderful thing to say because I previously had a painful back strain. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Good for adding resistance
customer_reviews.text: I use these in the water for exercise. They are good for adding resistance for your arms.
customer_reviews.author: GrammaW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dumbbells for Water Exercise
customer_reviews.text: These offer very good resistance in the water. After 30 minutes of usage, I can definitely feel it!
customer_reviews.author: Tootles

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise
customer_reviews.text: I use to exercise in pool. Enough resistance for 72 yr old. So far holding up after 10 plus times. They don’t hold water.
customer_reviews.author: So sew

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I am trying to work out in the pool everyday; I’m focusing on my arms. It’s hard to believe the resistance I get with these. It’s much more fun in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: These are great for anyone looking for a gentle no impact low impact work out in water :D
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love for water workouts!! Great water resistance weights. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McClure

customer_reviews.title: Smartest dumbbells ever!
customer_reviews.text: I'm addicted to water fitness. These dumbbells are awesome. They are of a weight between what my gym offers, and I find them to be a good "all around" addition to my program. (I'm writing a book, watch for it!)
customer_reviews.author: SapphireBlues

customer_reviews.title: Zeyu Sports Aquatic Dumbbells Are Great
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived I didn't think they would work very well. I loved them so much, I now own 4 pair. I have friends who do Aquatic Exercise with me and they just love them too. Great resistance in the water. Would highly recommend them to all.
customer_reviews.author: Irene A. Neading

product_meta.title: ZEYU SPORTS Aquatic Exercise Dumbbells - Set of 2 - for Water Aerobics
feature_bullets: Made from EVA foam, providing buoyancy and low water Absorption
Each barbell measures 11" long x 6" wide and weighs .66lbs
Work your upper body as well as your lower back and ABS for a total fitness workout
Warning: not to be used as a flotation device. For ages 14+
